title: Barycentric coordinates
content: Lemmas about barycentric coordinates. For the moment, this is limited to the one-dimensional case (complex line), where existence and uniqueness of barycentric coordinates are proved by ~ bj-bary1 (which computes them). It would be nice to prove the two-dimensional case (is it easier to use ad hoc computations, or Cramer formulas?), in order to do some planar geometry.

blocks.name: bj-bary1lem
blocks.content: A lemma for barycentric coordinates in one dimension. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-bary1lem(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(co(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmul, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, c1))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(c0, co(co(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmul, c1)), co(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmul, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cmul, c1), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2))), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmul, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cmul, c1), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co(co(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cmul, c1)), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2), co(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cmul, c1)), w0)
  3eqtr4rd(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cmul, c1)), co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), w0)
  3eqtr2d(co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat0, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat0), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(nat0, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2))), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1))), w0)
  addsub12d(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c2, cmul, c1), w0)
  subcld(co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c0, cmul, c2), w0)
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1)), co(nat0, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1)), co(nat0, cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1)), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), w0)
  sub32d(co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c1), w0)
  mulcld(c1, c2, w0)
  mulcld(c2, c1, w0)
  oveq1d(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1)), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2), nat0, w0)
  bj-subcom(c1, c2, w0)
  addsubassd(co(c0, cmul, c1), nat0, co(c0, cmul, c2), w0)
  0cnd(w0)
  mulcld(c0, c2, w0)
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, nat0), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c0, cmul, c1), w0)
  addid1d(co(c0, cmul, c1), w0)
  mulcld(c0, c1, w0)
  oveq12d(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cmul, c1), co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmin, co(c2, cmul, c1)), w0)
  subdird(c1, c0, c2, w0)
  subdird(c0, c2, c1, w0)
  subdid(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  divdird(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmul, c2), co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cmul, c1), co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  mulcld(co(c1, cmin, c0), c2, w0)
  mulcld(co(c0, cmin, c2), c1, w0)
  divcan4d(c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  oveq12d(co(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmul, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cmul, c1), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmul, c2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmul, c1), w0)
  div23d(co(c1, cmin, c0), c2, co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  subcld(c1, c0, w0)
  div23d(co(c0, cmin, c2), c1, co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  subcld(c0, c2, w0)
  subcld(c1, c2, w0)
  subne0d(c1, c2, w0)
  necomd(c1, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: bj-bary1lem1
blocks.content: Existence and uniqueness (and actual computation) of barycentric coordinates in dimension 1 (complex line). (Contributed by BJ, 6-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-bary1lem1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1)), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
} = {
  3syld(w0, wa(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1)), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, cmin, c2), co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2))))
  sylibd(w0, wa(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1)), wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)))), wceq(c0, co(co(c2, cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))))
  sylan2d(w0, wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1), wceq(c0, co(co(c2, cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(c1, co(nat1, cmin, c3)))
  syl6(w0, wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1), wceq(c1, co(nat1, cmin, c3)), wa(wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), co(nat1, cmin, c3)), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), c1)))
  sylancl(w0, wi(wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1), wa(wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), co(nat1, cmin, c3)), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), c1))), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), c1), wi(wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), co(nat1, cmin, c3))))
  pncand(c1, c3, w0)
  oveq1(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1, cmin, c3)
  pm5.31(wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), c1), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), co(nat1, cmin, c3)))
  eqcomd(c1, co(nat1, cmin, c3), wa(wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), co(nat1, cmin, c3)), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), c1)))
  eqtr2(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), cmin, c3), co(nat1, cmin, c3), c1)
  ex(w0, wa(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(c1, co(nat1, cmin, c3))), wceq(c0, co(co(c2, cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))))
  sylan9eqr(c0, co(co(c2, cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)), co(co(co(nat1, cmin, c3), cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)), w0, wa(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(c1, co(nat1, cmin, c3))))
  sylan2(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(c1, co(nat1, cmin, c3)), wceq(c0, co(co(co(nat1, cmin, c3), cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)), co(co(co(nat1, cmin, c3), cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))))
  oveq1d(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4), co(co(nat1, cmin, c3), cmul, c2), wceq(c1, co(nat1, cmin, c3)))
  oveq1(c1, co(nat1, cmin, c3), cmul, c2)
  eqtr(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)), co(co(co(nat1, cmin, c3), cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)))
  oveq1d(co(co(nat1, cmin, c3), cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4), co(c2, cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(nat1, cmin, c3), cmul, c2), co(c2, cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), co(co(nat1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), w0)
  subdird(nat1, c3, c2, w0)
  1cnd(w0)
  oveq1d(co(nat1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2), c2, w0)
  mulid2d(c2, w0)
  eqeq2d(c0, co(co(c2, cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)), co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2))), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(c2, cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)), co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2))), co(c2, caddc, co(co(c3, cmul, c4), cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2))), w0)
  subadd23d(c2, co(c3, cmul, c2), co(c3, cmul, c4), w0)
  mulcld(c3, c2, w0)
  mulcld(c3, c4, w0)
  oveq2d(c2, caddc, co(co(c3, cmul, c4), cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)), w0)
  eqcomd(co(co(c3, cmul, c4), cmin, co(c3, cmul, c2)), co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)), w0)
  subdid(c3, c4, c2, w0)
  syl5ib(w0, wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, cmin, c2), co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(co(c0, cmin, c2), co(co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2))), cmin, c2)))
  oveq1(c0, co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2))), cmin, c2)
  eqeq2d(co(c0, cmin, c2), co(co(c2, caddc, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2))), cmin, c2), co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)), w0)
  pncan2d(c2, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)), w0)
  mulcld(c3, co(c4, cmin, c2), w0)
  syl5bi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c2), co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)), co(c0, cmin, c2)))
  eqcom(co(c0, cmin, c2), co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)))
  sylbid(w0, wceq(co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)), co(c0, cmin, c2)), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(co(co(c4, cmin, c2), cmul, c3), co(c0, cmin, c2)))
  eqeq1d(co(c3, cmul, co(c4, cmin, c2)), co(c0, cmin, c2), co(co(c4, cmin, c2), cmul, c3), w0)
  mulcomd(c3, co(c4, cmin, c2), w0)
  biimpd(w0, wceq(co(co(c4, cmin, c2), cmul, c3), co(c0, cmin, c2)), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))))
  rdiv(co(c4, cmin, c2), c3, co(c0, cmin, c2), w0)
  subcld(c4, c2, w0)
  subcld(c0, c2, w0)
  subne0d(c4, c2, w0)
  necomd(c4, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: bj-bary1
blocks.content: Barycentric coordinates in one dimension. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-bary1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wa(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1)), wa(wceq(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wa(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1)), wa(wceq(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)))))
  jcad(w0, wa(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1)), wceq(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))))
  sylibd(w0, wa(wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1)), wceq(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c1, co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c4))))
  syl2and(w0, wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1), wceq(c1, co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c4))), wceq(c0, co(co(c3, cmul, c4), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2))), wceq(co(c3, caddc, c1), nat1))
  biimpd(w0, wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(c0, co(co(c3, cmul, c4), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2))))
  eqeq2d(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)), co(co(c3, cmul, c4), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), w0)
  addcomd(co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c3, cmul, c4), w0)
  mulcld(c1, c2, w0)
  mulcld(c3, c4, w0)
  biimpd(w0, wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1), wceq(co(c3, caddc, c1), nat1))
  eqeq1d(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1, co(c3, caddc, c1), w0)
  addcomd(c1, c3, w0)
  bj-bary1lem1(c0, c3, c4, c1, c2, w0)
  eqeq2d(c1, co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cdiv, co(c2, cmin, c4)), co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), w0)
  div2subd(c0, c4, c2, c4, w0)
  bj-bary1lem1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  jcad(w0, wa(wceq(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)))), wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1))
  syl6an(w0, wa(wceq(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)))), wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4))), wceq(c0, co(co(co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c4))), wceq(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)), co(co(co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c4))))
  bj-bary1lem(c0, c4, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wi(wa(wceq(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)))), wceq(co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)), co(co(co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c4)))))
  oveqan12d(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4), co(co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c4), wceq(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))))
  oveq1(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c2)
  oveq1(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c4)
  eqtr3(c0, co(co(co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c2), caddc, co(co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), cmul, c4)), co(co(c1, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c3, cmul, c4)))
  syl5ib(w0, wa(wceq(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), wceq(c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), nat1), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), co(co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)))))
  oveq12(c1, co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), c3, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), caddc)
  eqeq2d(co(c1, caddc, c3), co(co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), nat1, w0)
  eqtr3d(co(co(co(c4, cmin, c0), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), caddc, co(co(c0, cmin, c2), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2))), nat1, co(co(co(c4, cmin, c0), caddc, co(c0, cmin, c2)), cdiv, co(c4, cmin, c2)), w0)
  divdird(co(c4, cmin, c0), co(c0, cmin, c2), co(c4, cmin, c2), w0)
  subcld(c4, c0, w0)
  subcld(c0, c2, w0)
  diveq1bd(co(co(c4, cmin, c0), caddc, co(c0, cmin, c2)), co(c4, cmin, c2), w0)
  subcld(c4, c2, w0)
  subne0d(c4, c2, w0)
  necomd(c4, c2, w0)
  npncand(c4, c0, c2, w0)
}
